QuestData.Title: Secrets of the Mire
QuestData.Description: The Shifting Mire takes its name from a unique phenomenon. By some force, the extremely fine silt will collect, and move on its own accord, travelling as if alive.$B$BI originally worried this was some corruptive force, but my studies have shown the opposite; whatever energy invigorates this soil is positive in nature. Perhaps such vibrant life can be imparted onto the Broken to reawaken what they once were.$B$BThe silt may not take kindly to being collected, $n. But please, help gather it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 samples of Invigorated Silt from Shifting Mireglobs.
QuestData.RewardText: It will have to be purified, but this will be most helpful. Thank you.
